data.title: MArk Naumann – 88.3 Southern FM
data.text:
Tag: MArk Naumann

Clifford Hoad from Kings Of The Sun LIVE on Purple Haze this Wednesday night 8pm (AEDT)

Join host Mark Naumann with special guest LIVE – Clifford Hoad from classic Oz rock band ‘Kings Of The Sun’. Cliff has released the hottest rock album this year ‘Razed On Rock’ and it is chock-a-block full of power rock. Tune in to 88.3FM Bayside Melbourne 8pm (AEDT) this Wednesday night 16/11/16 or stream it LIVE from www.southernfm.com.au Purple Haze is

Read more

Chantoozies LIVE on Purple Haze this Wednesday night 8pm (AEDT)

Join host Mark Naumann on Purple Haze this Wednesday night when Eve von Bibra and Tottie Goldsmith from The Chantoozies drop in to the studio to have a chat about their careers and play the music that have made them household names. Tune in Bayside Melbourne at 88.3 FM – or stream it anywhere in the world from www.southernfm.com.au 8pm

Read more

Deborah Conway and Willy Zygier LIVE in the Purple Haze Studio Wednesday night 21/9/16 8pm

Join host Mark Naumann and Purple Haze next Wednesday night 8pm (AET) when Deborah Conway and Willy Zygier drop in to chat about and play their new album ‘Everybody’s Begging’. Tune in at 88.3 Southern FM Bayside Melbourne or stream it live from www.southernFM.com.au Purple Haze is sponsored by Classic Cars with Character

Read more

Peter Farnan (Boom Crash Opera) LIVE in studio Wednesday night 8pm (AET) presenting his new project ‘Pesky Bones’

Join Mark Naumann on Purple Haze Wednesday night 7/9/16 at 8pm (AET) when Peter Farnan drops in to play his new album project ‘Pesky Bones’ for the first time – a world exclusive for Purple Haze. Pesky Bones is a recording project where guest vocalists sing songs written, performed and recorded by Peter. His guests include Paul Kelly, Deborah Conway, Tim

Read more

Gil Matthews presents the remastered album ‘So Much Love From Normie Rowe’ on Purple Haze

Join host Mark Naumann with special guest Gil Matthews from Aztec Records presenting the remastered album from 1966 – So Much Love From Normie Rowe’ The remastered edition features many bonus tracks in a magnificently presented digi-pack CD. Tune in from 8pm (AET) Wednesday night 17/8/16 and we will play the entire album, and maybe even have a chat to

Read more
